description: MARRIAGE LICENSES • Ruben A. Rosa and Danielle M. Ross, both of Jermyn. • Angelo Joseph Pettitto Jr., Madison Twp., and Mary Lou Madden, Scranton.
title: Lackawanna County Court Notes 1/9/2018
maintext:
MARRIAGE LICENSES
• Ruben A. Rosa and Danielle M. Ross, both of Jermyn.
• Angelo Joseph Pettitto Jr., Madison Twp., and Mary Lou Madden, Scranton.
• Jesse Warren McCabe and Alina Christine Flory, both of Greenville, Ohio.
PROPERTY TRANSACTIONS
• Blue Shutters Land Development LLC, Covington Twp., to Hengfu Ni and Jie Zhao, Moscow; a property at 124 Golden Oak Drive, Covington Twp., for $55,000.
• Hay Van and Lan Le, Scranton, to Lance Jay Robbins, Lackawanna County; two parcels at 443-445 Colfax Ave., Scranton, for $100,000.
• William Caboot and Terri Madara, now by marriage Terri Caboot, as joint tenants with rights of survivorship, to Clark C. and Sheryl Cree, Pennsylvania; a property at 8 Lily Lane, Thornhurst Twp., to $125,000.
• Season Jackson, Lackawanna County, to Shea O’Connor and Amber Martonick, Lackawanna County, as joint tenants with rights of survivorship; a property at 301 Second St., Blakely, for $147,000.
• Heidi C. and Richard E. Barth, Dunmore, to Jeffrey W. and Cheryl Guse, Dunmore; a property at 108 Sherwood Ave., Dunmore, for $230,000.
• Michael Gleeson, also known as Michael Gleason, Archbald, to Christopher Ross, Dunmore; a property in Roaring Brook Twp., for $88,000.
• Ocwen Loan Servicing LLC, attorney-in-fact for Wells Fargo Bank, West Palm Beach, Fla., to Nick Thompson, Clarks Green; a property at 203 Fairview Road, Clarks Green, for $166,000.
• Northeast Real Estate Development Inc. to Steven W. and Vivian Krauss; a property at 113 W. Market St., Scranton, for $32,500.
• Mariann Moran, executrix of the estate of Dorothy A. Murphy, Scranton, to James Patrick Murphy, Clarks Summit; a property in Scranton for $30,000.
• Cloverleaf Developers LLC, Archbald, to Catherine A. Healey, Archbald; a property at 113 Forest Drive, Archbald, for $221,200.
DIVORCES SOUGHT
• Jeremy Lee Evans, Dickson City, v. Ashley Hope Johnson, Shelton, Wash.; married June 12, 2007, in Waverly; pro se.
• Shraddha Rayamajhi, Scranton, v. Ashish Ojha, Randallstown; married March 23, 2016, in Scranton; Barbara J. O’Hara, attorney.
• William Caswell, Scranton, v. Donna Caswell, Duryea; married Sept. 15, 1988, in Scranton; pro se.
FEDERAL TAX LIEN
• Michael V. and Francene Dudziec, 3906 Wylam Ave., Moosic; $22,160.56.
